en-US.alert_about: Location Triggers works with Autocuts to automatically run shortcuts in the background based on your location while you use your iOS device.
en-US.alert_donate: Thank you for donating and supporting my Shortcuts development!
en-US.alert_get_location: Retrieving your current location. This may take a few moments.
en-US.alert_localization:
Want to see Location Triggers localized for your native language?

Visit Location Triggers' localization page on GitHub and submit a pull request.
en-US.alert_new_shortcut: You must select a shortcut to continue.
en-US.alert_update_none: You are running the latest version of Location Triggers.
en-US.alert_welcome:
Location Triggers runs shortcuts as you arrive and leave locations.

Pair it with Autocuts, and your shortcuts can run automatically in the background while you use your iOS device.
en-US.error_location_none: No locations could be found in the input sent to Location Triggers.
en-US.error_timeRange: The end date is before the start date.
en-US.prompt_delete: Delete this location trigger? This operation cannot be undone.
en-US.prompt_delete_multiple: Delete selected location triggers? This operation cannot be undone.
en-US.prompt_donate:
Have you found Location Triggers to be helpful in running your shortcuts automatically in the background when you arrive and leave a location?

Send me a tip to help fund future development of Location Triggers and other shortcuts.
en-US.prompt_erase_content:
Are you sure you want to delete all Location Triggers content and settings for this device?

All of your existing location triggers will be deleted.

This operation cannot be undone.
en-US.prompt_erase_content2:
Are you ABSOLUTELY SURE you want to delete all Location Triggers content and settings for this device?

All of your existing location triggers will be deleted.

This operation cannot be undone.
en-US.prompt_filter: Separate keywords with newlines to filter the list of location triggers.
en-US.prompt_limitkit_locationTrigger:
Enter the LimitKit Interval (whole numbers only) for this location trigger. The location trigger will not be re-evaluated until this time period has elapsed.

You will choose the unit of measurement (seconds, minutes, hours, etc.) in the next screen.

Enter 0 to disable LimitKit with this location trigger.
en-US.prompt_limitkit_locationTrigger_unit: Select the unit of measurement that the location trigger must wait before its shortcut can run again.
en-US.prompt_new_input: Select an input type for this shortcut:
en-US.prompt_new_input_askShortcut: Location Triggers will call the shortcut with "Autocuts Custom Input". The shortcut must be able to display custom UI for providing input for this operation to work.
en-US.prompt_new_location:
Enter location.

Leave blank to use your current location.
en-US.prompt_new_onSuccess: What should happen to the location trigger after a successful match?
en-US.prompt_new_tags: Enter tags to organize your location triggers. Separate each tag with a new line.
en-US.prompt_new_time: Select the time your location trigger will be evaluated:
en-US.prompt_new_type:
Create a new location trigger that will run a shortcut when you arrive or leave a location.

If you want your shortcuts to run automatically while you use your iOS device, use Location Triggers with Autocuts.
en-US.prompt_reset: Reset Location Triggers settings or erase all content and settings for Location Triggers?
en-US.prompt_reset_settings:
Are you sure you want to reset Location Triggers settings on this device?

None of your content will be affected.
en-US.prompt_settings_radius: Enter the default trigger radius in {{unit}}:
